channel.title: Openai on Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Openai on Hugo

item.title: Nginx 代理 openai api
item.description: 安装 Nginx ubuntu: sudo apt install nginx 配置 Openai 反向代理 在目录 /etc/nginx/conf.d 下创建文件 openai.conf /etc/nginx/conf.d/openai.conf server { listen 8000; location /v1/ { proxy_pass https://api.openai.com/v1/; # OpenAI API URL proxy_ssl_server_name on; # 避免出现反代https域名出现502错误 proxy_buffering off; # 关闭缓存实
